instruction:
You are a Rust expert. Fix the following code that has a compilation error.
Return ONLY the fixed Rust code without any explanation or markdown formatting.
input:
## Buggy Code:
```rust
fn has_positive(opt: Option<i32>) -> bool { opt.map(|x| x > 0).unwrap_or(false) }
```

## Compiler Error:
use is_some_and/is_ok_and instead of map+unwrap_or

## Fixed Code:
output: fn has_positive(opt: Option<i32>) -> bool { opt.is_some_and(|x| x > 0) }
